msg
In the human information network, Houkai is packaged into various forms of disaster, deceiving people's cognition.
在人类的信息网中，崩坏被包装成各种形式的灾难，欺骗着人们的认知。
人類の情報網の中で、崩壊は様々な形の災いに姿を変え、人々の認識を欺いてきた。
인류의 정보망 속에서, 붕괴는 다양한 형태의 재앙으로 모습을 바꾸며 사람들의 인식을 속여왔다.
In the Human Information Network, Honkai is packaged as various forms of catastrophe, deceiving people's perceptions.
In the human information network, Honkai has transformed itself into various forms of calamity, deceiving people's perceptions.
msg
Few people in the vast human community know the truth of the disaster that threatens the survival of the human race.
这场威胁着人类种族存亡的灾难，知晓其真相的人却在人类庞大的族群中寥寥无几。
人類という種族の存亡を脅かすこの災いの真相を知っている者は、#n膨大な人類の中でもほとんどいない。
인류라는 종족의 존망을 위협하는 이 재앙의 진상을 아는 자는,#n막대한 인류 중에서도 거의 없었다.
This catastrophe, which threatens the survival of the human race, is known to very few in the vast human community.
Few among the vast human population know the truth about this plague that threatens the very existence of the human race.
msg
All of this is because of the organizations on the front lines of the Houkai, who using their power to isolate the Houkai of information from human civilization.
这一切只因那些站在崩坏前沿的组织，他们以自己的权势与力量将崩坏的信息隔绝于人类文明之外。
その要因は、崩壊の前線に立つ組織が自らの権力と力を使い、#n崩壊の情報を人類文明より隠匿したせいだ。
그 요인은, 붕괴의 최전선에 선 조직이 자신들의 권력과 힘을 이용해,#n붕괴의 정보를 인류 문명으로부터 은폐했기 때문이다.
All of this is only possible because of the organizations that are at the forefront of the Honkai, who have used their power and strength to isolate the message of the Honkai from human civilization.
This is due to the fact that the organizations on the front lines of the Honkai used their power and strength to conceal information about the Honkai from human civilization.
msg
By the name of protecting the human race, monopolizing the intelligence and technology of Houkai, in order to control and manipulate the entire world.
借着保护人类的美名，独占崩坏的情报与科技，以此掌控并操纵着整个世界。
人類を守るという大義名分を振りかざし、崩壊に関する情報と科学技術を独占し、#nそれによって世界全体を操った。
인류를 지킨다는 대의명분을 내세우며, 붕괴에 관한 정보와 과학 기술을 독점하고,#n그것으로 세계 전체를 조종했다.
In the name of protecting mankind, they have exclusive access to Honkai's intelligence and technology, and in doing so, they control and manipulate the entire world.
Wielding the cause of protecting humanity, they monopolized information and science and technology related to Honkai and thereby manipulated the entire world.
msg
And the real victims are always the people who die in the Houkai...They don't even know what it is that kills them in the moment of disaster.
而真正的受害者，永远都是在崩坏中死亡的人民大众…他们甚至在灾难来临的瞬间都不知杀死自己的究竟为何物。
そして、いつの時代も本当の被害者は崩壊の中で死んでいく大衆だった……#n彼らは災いが降臨した瞬間、自分が何者に殺されるかも知らず、#nそのまま死んでいった。
그리고, 언제나 진정한 피해자는 붕괴 속에서 죽어가는 대중이었다...#n그들은 재앙이 강림한 순간, 자신이 무엇에게 죽는지도 모른 채,#n그대로 죽어갔다.
And the real victims are always the masses of people who die in the Honkai...who don't even know exactly what it is that kills them at the moment of disaster.

msg
The destiny of human beings should be in their own hands, and the existence of Houkai should be known to the world.

The destiny of mankind should be in his own hands, and the existence of Honkai should be known to the world.

Only when the entire human race faces the Houkai and struggles together, the human civilization will truly rise.

Only when the entire human race stands together against Honkai will human civilization truly rise.

It's about human history, about civilization, about technology, about the connections between you and me, and I found the answer in a terminal buried deep in the blue ocean.
它关乎到人类的历史，文明，科技，甚至是你我之间千丝万缕的联系，而在深埋于伽蓝之底的终端中我找到了最终的答案。
